text: Martine Marie Étienne Moïse (born 5 June 1974) is the former First Lady of Haiti and was the wife of President Jovenel Moïse. She was the country's first lady from February 2017 until the assassination of her husband on July 7, 2021. Martine Moïse was wounded in the same attack at their home in Pétion- Ville on 7 July 2021. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies Category:Haitian people
title: Martine Moïse
